dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6926 IH: No Taxpayer Dollars for Communist China COVID Tests Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Harshbarger (for herself, Mr. Gohmert, Mr. Gimenez, Mr. Reschenthaler, Mr. Gaetz, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Mr. Babin, Mr. Brooks, Mr. Waltz, Mr. Posey, Mr. Ellzey, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Balderson, Mr. Tiffany, and Mr. DesJarlais) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to purchase at-home tests for SARS–CoV–2 that are imported from, or manufactured in, the People’s Republic of China.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Taxpayer Dollars for Communist China COVID Tests Act.

section.header: Prohibition on using Federal funds to purchase certain tests
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be used to purchase any at-home test for SARS–CoV–2 that is imported from the People's Republic of China, or that was manufactured, in whole or in part, in the People's Republic of China.
